Here are 3 jobs also advertised:{ {Typist/Word Processor Â£3144-Â£5236 pa:} Shorthand/Typist/Receptionist Â£5500 pa {Maintenance Plumber Â£141.28 per week. {CREDITS}:Work on this project was done by the following:- {Elloughton C.P.School: Mrs.D.Walker(teacher);Mrs.P.Dawson (Secretary);Mr.J.Pitts(Headteacher). {Welton C.P.School: Mr.P.Jarvis(Deputy-Head). {Further assistance acknowledged from {Mrs.D.Putnam,Mr.R.Pickford,children {from both schools and members of local {firms and organisations.
